prAgAqcCasa#naM ~MvAqjyarvA# dEvaqdrIcAq mana#sAq dIddhyA#naH | 
aqjaH puqrO nI#yatEq nABi#raqsyAnu# paqScAt kaqvayO# yanti rEqBAH ||
upaq prAgA$t paraqmaM ~Myath saqdhasthaqmarvAq(gm)q acCA# piqtara#M mAqtara#M ca | 
aqdyA dEqvAn juShTa#tamOq hi gaqmyA athA&&SA$stE dAqSuShEq vAryA#Ni || 38
(vipRu#ktO - diqvA - vIqrya# - mupai - kAqnnaca#tvAriq(gm)qSacca#) (A7)
